H0.text: The pupil is the part of the eye that allows light to enter.

H1.text: Eyelid is the part of the eye that allows light to enter.

H2.text: Retina is the part of the eye that allows light to enter.

H3.text: The iris is the part of the eye that allows light to enter.

A5.text: Muscles around the iris change the size of the pupil, regulating the amount of light that enters the eye and reducing aberrations when there is enough light.
